00052 // class for Allocate/Unallocation memory buffer
00053 TemporaryMemoryBuffer::TemporaryMemoryBuffer( size_t SizeOfBuffer )
00054 {
00055     Buffer = new OMISCID_TLM char[SizeOfBuffer];
00056     if ( Buffer == NULL )
00057     {
00058         BufferSize = 0;
00059         throw MemoryBufferException( "No more memory to allocate buffer" );
00060     }
00061     BufferSize = SizeOfBuffer;
00062 }
00063
00064 TemporaryMemoryBuffer::~TemporaryMemoryBuffer()
00065 {
00066     if ( Buffer != NULL )
00067     {
00068         delete [] Buffer;
00069     }
00070 }
00071
00072 TemporaryMemoryBuffer::operator char*() const
00073 {
00074     return (char*)Buffer;
00075 }
00076
00077 TemporaryMemoryBuffer::operator unsigned char*() const
00078 {
00079     return (unsigned char*)Buffer;
00080 }
00081
00082 size_t TemporaryMemoryBuffer::GetLength() const
00083 {
00084     return BufferSize;
00085 }

00087 #ifdef WIN32
00088 
00089 int Omiscid::random()
00090 {
00091     int result;
00092
00093 #if RAND_MAX <= 32767
00094     int i;
00095     short * where = (short*)&result;
00096     for( i = 0; i < (sizeof(result)/sizeof(short)); i++ )
00097     {
00098         where[i] = (short)rand();
00099     }
00100 #else
00101     result = rand();
00102 #endif
00103     return result;
00104 }
00105
00106 int Omiscid::gettimeofday(struct timeval * tv,struct timezone * tz )
00107 {
00108     struct _timeb tb;
00109     _ftime(&tb);
00110
00111     tv->tv_sec  = (long)tb.time;
00112     tv->tv_usec = tb.millitm * (long)1000;
00113
00114     return 0;
00115 }
00116
00117 #endif // WIN32

00119 #if defined WIN32 || defined __APPLE__

00121 // Add libc extension from gnu to Windows/Mac OSX
00122
00123 void * Omiscid::memrchr( const void * Buf, int c, size_t size )
00124 {
00125     char *    TmpChar;
00126     size_t        Pos;
00127     char    TmpC;
00128
00129     if ( Buf == NULL || size <= 0 )
00130     {
00131         return NULL;
00132     }
00133
00134     TmpChar = (char*)Buf;
00135     TmpC = (char)c;
00136
00137     for( Pos = size-1; Pos >= 0; Pos-- )
00138     {
00139         if ( TmpChar[Pos] == TmpC )
00140         {
00141             return (void*)&TmpChar[Pos];
00142         }
00143     }
00144     return NULL;
00145 }
00146
00147 #endif // defined WIN32 || defined __APPLE__

00149 #ifndef __APPLE__
00150 
00151 // Port of this interesting apple function
00152 size_t Omiscid::strlcpy(char *dst, const char *src, size_t size)
00153 {
00154     size_t i;
00155     size_t max;
00156
00157     if ( dst == NULL || src == NULL || size == 0 )
00158     {
00159         return (size_t)0;
00160     }
00161
00162     // max pos to copy (we want to keep a place for '\0'
00163     max = size-1;
00164
00165     // copy data
00166     for( i = 0; i < max && src[i] != '\0'; i++ )
00167     {
00168         dst[i] = src[i];
00169     }
00170
00171     // Just to be sure, let's put a '\0' at end
00172     dst[i] = '\0';
00173
00174     return i;
00175 }
00176
00177 #endif
00178 
00179
00180 void Omiscid::RandomInit()
00181 {
00182         struct timeval t;
00183         gettimeofday(&t, NULL);
00184
00185 #ifdef WIN32
00186         srand(t.tv_sec ^ t.tv_usec ^ (long int)GetCurrentThreadId());
00187 #else    // WIN32
00188         srandom(t.tv_sec ^ t.tv_usec ^ (long int)pthread_self() );
00189 #endif    // WIN32
00190 }
00191
00192 SimpleString Omiscid::GetLoggedUser()
00193 {
00194     SimpleString Login;
00195
00196 #ifdef WIN32
00197     #define MAX_LOGIN_LEN 512
00198 
00199     DWORD len;
00200     TemporaryMemoryBuffer UserName(MAX_LOGIN_LEN);    // for debugging purpose
00201
00202     // init data to empty login
00203     *((char*)UserName) = '\0';
00204     len = MAX_LOGIN_LEN-1;
00205
00206     GetUserName( UserName, &len );
00207     Login = UserName;
00208
00209     #undef MAX_LOGIN_LEN
00210 #else
00211     // alternatively we could use getpwuid( geteuid() );
00212     Login = getenv("LOGNAME");
00213 #endif
00214 
00215     return Login;
00216 }
